post.text: With 15 days to go, Hillary and Elizabeth Warren hit the trail in New Hampshire. Join them: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Quinn
comment.text: Comey confirmed she did everything she was accused of doing. She broke the law numerous times and should be in jail. Instead, while still under FBI investigation, she can run for president.

replies.author: Karissa
replies.text: She has been investigated multiple times and they found nothing. So get your facts straight.
